entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
